title: Wrong Place, Right Guy
description: “Wrong Place, Right Guy” She’s in the wrong place at the wrong time. Can the guy who saves her be Mr. Right? Or will his past keep them apart?When Kristen is jumped in a parking lot, Tony jumps in to save the day. While she thinks her hero could also be her heartthrob, Tony’s worried his past is reason to stay apart. Will the good guy get the girl in the end?A short story of 11,000 words, or 44 typical book pages.This is one of the stories from the collection Flirts! 5 Romantic Short Stories. Read them all, and discover the loose thread that ties them together. Check out the other Flirts! Beach Flirts!, Holiday Flirts!, Fairy Tale Flirts!, Wedding Flirts!, More Flirt!, and Reunion Flirts! Look for another Flirts! collection in summer 2013. And check out Lisa's Willowdale Romance Series.
author: Lisa  Scott
